content: illustration shows where to place the double_crochet sts holder or using a finer yarn round 5 3 chain 1dc in each double_crochet to end slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beginning 3 chain 48 double_crochet round 6 3 chain 1dc in each double_crochet to end slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beginning 3 chain 48 double_crochet round 7 commence shell pattern make 4 chain into the base of the 4 chain 1tr 1 chain 2 treble_crochet *miss 5 double_crochet into the 6th double_crochet 2 treble_crochet 1 chain 2 treble_crochet * repeat from * to * sl st into 4th chain of beginning 4 chain slip_stitch into 1 chain space of 1st shell round 10 3 chain in 3rd chain of beginning 3 chain 1 double_crochet in round 8 4 chain 1 treble_crochet 1 chain 2 treble_crochet into 1 chain space *2 treble_crochet each double_crochet to the end of round slip_stitch into 3rd chain of 1 chain 2 treble_crochet into the 1 chain space of next shell * repeat beginning 3ch from * to * slip_stitch into 4th chain of beginning 4 chain repeat round 2 until you have 8 row in total of the working the strap shell pattern row 11 1 single_crochet in the joining st 1 single_crochet in the inext 3 double_crochet 4 double_crochet 1 chain turn crochet drink bottle holder 3 row 12 single_crochet in the 4 single_crochet 1 chain turn repeat row 12 until the strap measures 42 ins/107 cms or length desired thread yarn off leaving enough yarn to sew the strap to the opposite side of the holder finish off by threading yarn off at the back of stitching and securing firmly crochet drink bottle holder 4
